tagsDecl.rendition: Text that has been printed by the publisher of the diary, e.g. the dateline in the opener of each entry
Text that has been written by hand by the author.

namespace.name: http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0
namespace.tagUsage: All datelines in the text are preprinted unless otherwise indicated using the rend attribute
All additions have been done by hand by the author unless otherwise indicated using the rend attribute.
All deletions have been done by hand by the author unless otherwise indicated using the rend attribute.
The first division in the back of type names glossary uses the n attribute to indicate the version of the backmatter.
